Program_Title: Texas Clean School Bus Program: Driving Toward Better Health

Headlines: Did you know that diesel pollution inside of a school bus can be five times higher than outside air? The Texas Commission on Environmental Quality (TCEQ) announced Oct. 29 that $9 million was available for public and charter schools that apply -- first-come, first-served -- for grants to retrofit eligible diesel-powered school buses with emissions-reduction technology. Learn more at http://www.cleanbuses.org/texas
